  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/3185</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/3185</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Anem...</string>
            <string language="en">Let's go to ...</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lassen Sie uns gehen...</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Partons...</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Deixe-nos ir...</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Andiamo...</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πηγαίνετε...</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Joc en què es vesteix un nen i una nena amb les diferents peces de roba i complements, tenint en compte l'entorn que prèviament s'ha escollit (la platja, la neu, l'excursió o l'escola).</string>
            <string language="en">Game in which the child dresses a boy and a girl in different garments depending on the scenario previously chosen (beach, snow, excursion, school).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">atenció</string>
            <string language="en">attention</string>
            <string language="es">atención</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">pensament lògic</string>
            <string language="en">logical thinking</string>
            <string language="es">pensamiento lógico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">percepció</string>
            <string language="en">perception</string>
            <string language="es">percepción</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">raonament</string>
            <string language="en">reasoning</string>
            <string language="es">razonamiento</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spiel, in dem das Kind einen Jungen und ein 
Mädchen in den unterschiedlichen Kleidern abhängig von dem vorher 
gewählten Drehbuch kleidet (Strand, Schnee, Exkursion, Schule).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Jeu dans lequel l'enfant habille un garçon et une
fille dans différents vêtements selon le scénario précédemment 
choisi (plage, neige, excursion, école).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Jogo em que a criança veste um menino e uma 
menina em garments diferentes dependendo do scenario escolhido 
previamente (praia, neve, excursion, escola).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gioco in cui il bambino veste un ragazzo e una 
ragazza in indumenti differenti secondo il piano d'azione 
precedentemente scelto (spiaggia, neve, escursione, scuola).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παιχνίδι στο οποίο το παιδί ντύνουν ένα αγόρι και 
ένα κορίτσι στα διαφορετικά ενδύματα ανάλογα με το σενάριο που 
επιλέγεται προηγουμένως (παραλία, χιόνι, εξόρμηση, σχολείο).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Aufmerksamkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">logisches Denken</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vorstellung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Argumentation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">attention</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">pensée logique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">perception</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">raisonnement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">atenção</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">pensar lógico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">percepção</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">raciocínio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">attenzione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">pensare logico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">percezione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ragionamento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">προσοχή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λογική σκέψη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αντίληψη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">συλλογισμός</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
